animation.$description: Named animation presets with distance and opacity parameters

$description: Semantic gradient tokens  intent-based gradients referencing primitive colors

dark.$description: Dark mode color overrides - WCAG AA compliant
Dark mode border colors - WCAG 3:1 UI component contrast
Dark mode text colors - WCAG AA compliant (4.5:1 minimum)

glass.$description: Frosted glass surface tokens  backdrop blur + semi-transparent backgrounds

mesh.light: radial-gradient(at 40% 20%, #dbeafe 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 80% 0%, #ede9fe 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 0% 50%, #d1fae5 0px, transparent 50%)
mesh.dark: radial-gradient(at 40% 20%, #1e3a8a 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 80% 0%, #4c1d95 0px, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(at 0% 50%, #064e3b 0px, transparent 50%)
